synopsis.text: When You Hazuki, a spirited and determined 13-year-old, moves to Tokyo to live with her father and younger brother, Sunny, she finds herself drawn to the exhilarating world of volleyball. With dreams of joining Japan's national women's volleyball team at the 1988 Seoul Olympics, she joins her school's team, despite her father's disapproval. Under the harsh guidance of her coach, You quickly becomes a top player, earning the admiration of her peers and the media. Along the way, she forms a complex friendship with former rival Nami Hayase and finds herself vying for the affection of So Takiki, the captain of the boys' volleyball team. As You navigates the challenges of her sport and her heart, she discovers the true meaning of teamwork and perseverance.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
